Title: Ep. 53 - Peruvian Developer (Andrea Del Rio)
Description: Andrea Del Rio talks about her role as a Mozilla Open Web fellow, how she’s using her technical skills to help civil society organizations, and what it’s like to build products for the Association for Progressive Communications.
